mapper.select: SELECT p.book_id, p.wechat_openid, p.last_account_time, u.nick_name, u.avatar_url FROM account_book_parters p INNER JOIN wechat_user u ON p.wechat_openid = u.wechat_openid WHERE p.book_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE account_book_parters SET last_account_time = NOW() WHERE book_id = #{bookId} AND wechat_openid = #{userId}
